com.headwire.testing.cq.factory

Interface AuthorPage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthorPage56, AuthorPage60, AuthorPage61, BaseAuthorPage

    public interface AuthorPage
    Provides helper methods to perform actions on WCM author pages The classic UI uses /cf# in the url and the new AEM UI uses /editor.html with a suffix for the url
    Author:
    Diran Samarjian

                              java.lang.String prefix)

        Parameters:
        fieldName - The name of each individual field
